div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1841 Thatta, Attock district, Punjab, Paki- (1100) stan, c. 1926 Burial: 2nd cent. B.C. (Le Rider) Contents: 10 AR Philoxenus: 1 dr. Indian punch-marked: 9 Disposition: unknown Archaeological Survey of India, Annual Report 1926-7 (Calcutta, 1930), p. 229
